nodes.text: The Side Gunner, also known as the Imperial Side Gunner, was a model of open repulsorlift vehicle used by the Galactic Empire, as well as the Fromm Gang and and the Tammuz-an military. The vehicles were utilized on Tammuz-an in 15 BBY.

The Side Gunner's cockpit was located in its central car, which sat a single pilot, while the gunner sat in a detachable sidecar. It equipped with four laser cannons, two of which were located on the front of the sidecar, one in front of the cockpit, and one mounted on the tip of the vehicle's wing.
